attributes.action: review the broken system of Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's who seem corrupt, ineffectual and hectoring legislation, a bloated public sector that drains resource and contributes little to the average person, illegal wars and absolutely no public confidence in "the system". No party is the answer, because it is the system that lacks coherence. Outdated, blinded and full of self-importance. Review this excuse for Democracy.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
